variable.name: SUBJ_NO
variable.comment: De-identified ID, unique subject ID for dbGaP

variable.name: CONSENT
variable.description: Consent group of subjects: 0 = Subjects did not participate in the study, did not complete a consent document and are included only for the pedigree structure and / or genotype controls, such as HapMap subjects; 1 = Subject consented to Alzheimer disease research conducted by non-profit and for-profit (pharmaceutical and biotechnology companies) organizations. Consented to genetic research of any human diseases conducted by non-profit and for-profit (pharmaceutical and biotechnology companies) organizations (GRU - General Research Use); 2 = Subject consented to Alzheimer disease research and genetic research of any human disease at non-profit organizations only (NPU - Non-Profit Organization Use); 3 = Subject consented to Alzheimer disease research only at non-profit and for-profit (pharmaceutical and biotechnology companies) organizations (Alz_only - Alzheimer Only); 4 = Consented to Alzheimer disease research only at non-profit organizations (Alz_NPU - Alzheimer_Non-Profit Organization Use)
variable.value: Subjects did not participate in the study, did not complete a consent document and are included only for the pedigree structure and/or genotype controls, such as HapMap subjects

variable.name: Source_Subject_ID
variable.description: Subject ID used in the Source Repository

variable.name: Consent_Source
variable.description: Name of repository the sample originated from

variable.name: Affection_Status
variable.description: Affection status (same as "Case_Control" variable in phenotype file)
